Articles.Content:
Anyway I just want to say HOLY TIME CAPSULE there are so many mods this drug up (granted at the expense of loosing several more mods, but I imagine those can be rebuilt)

I guess I have to get started rebuilding my post count.
Welcome back BFGfreak, don't forget not to spam when rebuilding post counts

That's ok, I'm certain that once docking gets implemented I'll have loads to talk about. How's 0.18 coming along anyway? Any chance you---dopeslap--- OK, I'll stop with the current events of October references. Anyway good luck Sal, Damion, and Skunky, I'm sure that you'll be plenty busy with the rebuilding of the forums.
